title.narrative: 6.1.2 CAPACITY BUILDING FOR EFP COMMUN

description.narrative: 6.1.3 Increased knowledge of EFP nationally have accurate knowledge of at least five key family practices and 60% can state the importance of access to routine health services in the 13 targeted prefectures., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, families and communities- including vulnerable and disadvantaged groups- sustain positive behaviours and essential family practices.

sector.narrative: Advocacy and partnership-building for social behaviour change
Technical assistance - Cross-sectoral communication for development
